ai-mil3.1.7:1.2_0: “Sir, he who does not pay proper attention to the elephant, does not occur in them,”
ai-mil3.1.7:1.3_0: “Great king, that improper attention is skillful and what is skillful.”
ai-mil3.1.7:1.4_0: “But that wise attention is not proper attention.”
ai-mil3.1.7:1.5_0: “Great king, there is no other thing to say that there is no enlightenment, depraved by wisdom. And there is no lucidity of wisdom.”
ai-mil3.1.7:3.1_0: the seventh enlightenment is the seventh enlightenment.
